paper_abstract: In this paper, the exponential stability problems are addressed for a class of delayed Cohen-Grossberg neural networks which are also perturbed by some stochastic noises. By employing the Lyapunov method, stochastic analysis and some inequality techniques, sufficient conditions are acquired for checking the pth(p > 1) and the 1st moment exponential stability of the network. Finally, One example is given to show the effectiveness of the proposed results.
paper_title: Exponential stability analysis for delayed stochastic Cohen-Grossberg neural network
